title: Clear Caches - EN
text:
1 -) Click on Home
2 -) Click on Menu
3 -) Click on Settings
4 -) Click on Clear Cache button

This helps remove temporary files and can make your app run faster and smoother!

title: Copy Trading History - EN
text:
1 -) Click on Futures
2 -) Click on Copy button
3 -) Click on Copy on right bottom corner
4 -) You can see the 'Ongoing - Closed' Copy Portfolios in this page.

title: Futures Swap Button (BNFCR) - EN
text:
You can't directly transfer the BNFCR back to spot wallet so you need to swap it BNB - BTC or ETH to transfer it back to spot wallet.

To do that, you can follow the steps in the screenshot:

1 -) Click on Assets
2 -) Click on Futures
3 -) Click on USDS-M Futures
4 -) Click on SWAP

In the SWAP page, you can select the BNFCR and Swap it to one of the supported coins (ETH-BNB or BTC)

Then once you have one these assets can transfer it back to spot wallet as well.
